*** Bug 59760 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 59875 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Can someone please respond to comment 1?  Tell us what JVM version you are 
running eclipse on?  There have been two other defects with this stacktrace and 
nobody is responding with the JVM version.

Also what build of eclispe are you using.  I think this has been fixed in the 
latest I-Build of eclipse.  But the situation should never occur if you are 
running on a 1.4.1 JRE which is required for eclipse 3.0 to run.
no further info available.  We cannot reproduce.
